CustomField.formula: IF($RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Weekly', ccpe_r__Start__c + 6, /*ELSE*/IF($RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Monthly', DATE( YEAR(ccpe_r__Start__c), MONTH(ccpe_r__Start__c), CASE(MONTH(ccpe_r__Start__c), 1, 31, 2, IF(MOD(YEAR(ccpe_r__Start__c), 4) = 0, 29, 28), 3, 31, 4, 30, 5, 31, 6, 30, 7, 31, 8, 31, 9, 30, 10, 31, 11, 30, 12, 31, 0 ) ), NULL ))
CustomField.label: End
